body_html: @drpngx Ah, there was a problem with my installation! It works just fine for me as well. Sorry about the confusion. I've tested your code as well as my entire network, which uses multiple scatter_nd's. I got a speed-up of ~5x for the latter. Thanks a lot for the patch!
